title: [By Hook or By Crook]
description: Sparsely furnished, the showroom amounts to a glass display case topped with an alabaster-carved hand sculpture, the arrangement illuminated by a skylight directly overhead.  The long, thin fingers of the chiseled appendage are laden with jewelry, the mix of metals and precious stones on each ring a work of art in its own right.  A pair of straight-backed ebonwood chairs flank a door leading out back of the wagon.
